online_plugins.title: Online Plugins
online_plugins.license_error: Failed to fetch license info, please try again later
online_plugins.installing_plugin: You are about to install plugin
online_plugins.install_risk_1: Plugins may modify server behavior or access resources
online_plugins.install_risk_2: Ensure the plugin source is trusted to avoid security risks
online_plugins.install_risk_3: It is recommended to validate in a testing environment first
online_plugins.third_repo_warning_lead: You are accessing a third-party plugin repository
online_plugins.third_repo_warning_p1: These plugins may not be reviewed and may have potential security risks.
online_plugins.third_repo_warning_p2: Installing these plugins may affect your server's stability and security.
online_plugins.third_repo_warning_p3: Before installing, review the code or ensure you trust the repository maintainers.
online_plugins.third_repo_warning_p4: Version switching for third-party plugins is supported since 1.4.3. This popup will not show again today after confirmation.
online_plugins.third_repo_warning_conclusion: Continuing means you understand and accept these risks.

msg.dep_not_found_after_refresh: Still cannot find plugin {pluginId} after refresh

terminal.title: Terminal Logs
terminal.placeholder_command: Enter command to send to MCDR terminal...
terminal.hint_tab: Use Tab to show/hide suggestions, or accept selection

msg.forbidden_command: This command is not allowed; it may crash or hang the UI!
msg.default_ai_query: Analyze errors in these logs and provide solutions
msg.system_prompt: You are a Minecraft server log analysis expert. Analyze the logs and provide detailed explanations and solutions. Focus only on relevant issues and do not repeat the logs.

ai_modal.title: AI Log Analysis
ai_modal.question: Question
ai_modal.placeholder: Enter your question, empty means 'Analyze errors in these logs and provide solutions'

msg.port_invalid: Port must be a valid number between 1 and 65535
msg.account_required: Super admin account cannot be empty
msg.repo_name_url_required: Repository name and URL cannot be empty
msg.repo_url_official_forbidden: Cannot add the same URL as the official repository
msg.repo_duplicate: Repository name or URL already exists
msg.repo_added_tip: Repository added. Click Save to persist configuration
msg.repo_deleted_tip: Repository deleted. Click Save to persist configuration
msg.https_need_both_files: Enabling HTTPS requires both certificate and key file paths
msg.https_confirm_text:
Please confirm that you have prepared SSL certificate and key files and the specified paths are correct.

If files don't exist, WebUI will fall back to HTTP.

Continue?
msg.https_save_success: HTTPS settings saved. Take effect after plugin restart. If SSL files do not exist, system will fall back to HTTP mode.

network.title: Network Settings
network.tip: Configure WebUI network binding. Restart the plugin to apply changes.
network.host_hint: Use 127.0.0.1 for local access only; use 0.0.0.0 to allow all network access
network.port_hint: Port range: 1-65535. Avoid using occupied ports

https.title: HTTPS Settings
https.tip: Configure WebUI HTTPS support. You need to provide valid SSL certificate and key files. Restart plugin after changes.
https.enable_desc: Use HTTPS encryption to protect your admin interface
https.ssl_tip_1: Ensure specified certificate and key files exist, otherwise system will fallback to HTTP mode
https.ssl_tip_2: File paths can be absolute (e.g., C:/ssl/cert.pem) or relative (e.g., ./ssl/cert.pem)
https.ssl_tip_3: Relative paths are based on MCDR root directory
https.cert_hint: Full path to SSL certificate file, e.g., ./ssl/cert.pem
https.key_hint: Full path to SSL key file, e.g., ./ssl/key.pem
https.key_pass_hint: If your SSL key file is password protected, enter password here
https.placeholder_key_pass: If your key file is password protected, enter here

account.title: Account Settings
account.super_admin_hint: QQ account with super admin permission

ai.title: AI Model Config
ai.api_url_hint: API URL address, DeepSeek default: https://api.deepseek.com/chat/completions
ai.model_hint: AI model name, DeepSeek default: deepseek-chat

public_chat.title: Public Chat Page Settings
public_chat.tip: Configure public chat page functionality options. These settings affect chat page access permissions and message forwarding features.
public_chat.enable_desc: Allow users to access the public chat page
public_chat.enable_to_game_desc: Allow public chat page users to send messages to Minecraft game

verification_expire.title: Verification Code Expiry
verification_expire.desc: Set the validity period of verification code (minutes)

session_expire.title: Session Expiry
session_expire.desc: Set chat page user session validity (hours)

history.title: Chat History Management
history.desc: Manage historical messages of the chat page

repo.title: MCDR Plugin Repository Settings
repo.tip: Support multiple repositories; third-party repos can be added. Official repos cannot be removed and act as default data source.
repo.name: Name

pim.title: PIM Standalone Plugin Config
pim.installed_tip: PIM is installed as standalone plugin. You can view and manage it in plugin management page.
pim.desc: Run WebUI's Plugin Installation Manager (PIM) as standalone plugin to provide installation support for other plugins. If you don't know what it does, please don't install.

projects.gugubot_desc: PFingan-MCDRQQ bot plugin offering many QQ bot features including admin and entertainment, with detailed configuration for customization.
projects.cq_desc: A forward WebSocket QQ bot based on CQ codes, providing MCDR plugin interfaces for building chat bots.
projects.web_desc: GUGUbot companion web management system for plugin management and configuration editing.

items.mcdr_repo_desc: Promote this plugin, provide quick install and info access

items.looseprince_desc: Feature design, documentation, web design, frontend coding

404.title: 404 - Page Not Found
404.heading: Page Not Found
404.description: Sorry, the page you visited does not exist or is unavailable.

guide.title: Configuration Guide
guide.desc: CQ-QQ-API connects to QQ via Websocket and communicates with QQ bot frameworks. Please set correct connection parameters.

form.language: Language used by MCDR for output
form.working_directory_tip: Default: server. Usually do not modify
form.start_command: Console command to start the server
form.start_command_tip: Paste your start command here (use exec mode by editing config file)
form.start_yaml: If the command contains characters YAML dislikes (e.g., " or \), see:
form.handler_desc: Different servers have completely different outputs and commands. Server handlers are modules for processing between various servers and are the access point for MCDR to control servers
form.handler_desc2: Handlers determine specific methods for parsing server standard output text and use correct commands to control servers
form.handler_vanilla: For vanilla / Carpet / Fabric servers. As long as the server is vanilla enough
form.handler_beta18: For low-version vanilla servers, such as MC < 1.7 low versions, even to beta1.8 version
form.handler_bukkit: For Bukkit / Spigot servers below version 1.14, and all versions of Paper / Mohistmc servers
form.handler_bukkit14: For Bukkit / Spigot servers version 1.14 or above
form.handler_basic: Handler that does not perform any analysis and returns original text
form.encoding_desc: encoding, decoding are used for encoding/decoding format when encoding messages to server standard input / decoding messages from server standard output
form.plugin_directories_tip: List of directories where MCDR searches for plugins to load, not recommended to modify
form.check_update_tip: Default: true, when enabled MCDR will perform update detection every 24 hours
form.advanced_console_tip: Based on prompt-toolkit, if you need to redirect MCDR's standard input/output, or just don't like this advanced console, set it to false (off)
form.disable_console_thread: Disable startup console thread for handling console command input
form.disable_console_thread_tip: Please keep default value unless you clearly know what this is
form.disable_console_color_tip: When set to true, MCDR will remove all console font formatting codes before printing all messages to console
form.custom_handlers_tip: Multiple items please edit config file directly
form.custom_handlers_desc: List of custom server handler classes. These classes should be subclasses of ServerHandler
form.custom_handlers_desc2: This way you can assign handlers to parse standard output text through handler names in the handler option
form.custom_handlers_desc3: Handler names are defined through the get_name() method
form.custom_handlers_doc: For detailed information see: Official Documentation
form.custom_info_reactors: Custom Info reactor classes for processing info objects
form.custom_info_reactors_desc: List of custom Info reactor classes for processing info objects. These classes should be subclasses of AbstractInfoReactor
form.custom_info_reactors_desc2: All custom info reactors will be registered to the reactor list to process information from servers
form.custom_info_reactors_doc: For detailed information see: Official Documentation
form.watchdog_threshold_tip: Time interval for watchdog to consider task executor thread unresponsive. Set to 0 to disable watchdog
form.handler_detection_desc: By default, MCDR will deprecate server handler correctness detection at startup and run for a period to detect possible server handler configuration errors
form.handler_detection_desc2: Set to false to disable server handler detection logic to reduce performance loss when MCDR starts running. This is mainly used for MCDR performance analysis
form.catalogue_meta_cache_ttl: Cache validity period for pulled plugin repository metadata
form.catalogue_meta_cache_ttl_tip: MCDR will use cached metadata as data source for subsequent plugin repository operations within the cache validity period
form.catalogue_meta_fetch_timeout: Timeout for pulling plugin repository metadata
form.catalogue_meta_url: Override URL for pulling plugin repository metadata
form.catalogue_meta_url_tip: URL pointing to "everything.json" or "everything_slim.json" file. If it ends with ".gz" (gzip) or ".xz" (lzma), corresponding decompression operations will be automatically applied
form.plugin_download_url_tip: Should be a valid str.format() string
form.plugin_download_url_doc: For detailed information see: Official Documentation
form.plugin_download_url_var_tag: Git tag name associated with this release
form.plugin_download_url_var_asset_name: Asset name, i.e., filename of plugin file to be downloaded
form.plugin_pip_install_extra_args: Extra arguments passed to pip subprocess when installing plugin dependencies during plugin installation
form.http_proxy_desc: Proxy settings for all MCDR external HTTP requests
form.http_proxy_desc2: If you plan to configure, it's recommended to configure both http_proxy and https_proxy values

rcon.title: RCON
rcon.desc: If enabled, after Minecraft rcon server starts, MCDR will auto connect to rcon so plugins can send commands via rcon

debug.title: Debug Log Mode
debug.desc: Set all to true to enable all debug outputs. You can turn on parts. Default all false (off)

perm.title: Permission Config
perm.desc: MCDReforged uses a permission system to control command and feature usage
perm.add_player_placeholder: Enter player name and press Enter to add
perm.default_level_tip: Default permission level for new players
perm.owner_tip: Highest permission, owner, has ability to control physical server. Example: Server owner
perm.admin_tip: Administrator, has ability to control MCDR and Minecraft server. Example: OP in Minecraft
perm.helper_tip: Assistant, can assist administrators in server management. Note: QB is level 2, example: Trusted member
perm.user_tip: Regular player, can play games. Example: Regular player
perm.guest_tip: Guest, can only view server information. Example: Lowest permission, such as visitor or troublemaker

login.title: Login
login.temp_tip: Get temporary login code via !!webui temp
login.go_chat: I'm a player, I need to access the server chat page

gugubot.title: GUGUBot Settings

guide.title: Configuration Guide
guide.desc1: GUGUBot connects QQ groups and MC servers, enabling message relay and command execution. Multiple config files control different modules.
guide.desc2: This page is experimental and may contain issues. Please report feedback.

msg.no_active_or_invalid_path: No active config or invalid path

gugubot.main_config_missing: Main config (config.yml) not found or failed to load.

keyword.qq_desc: Configure QQ group keyword triggers and replies, supporting text and image codes.
keyword.ingame_desc: Configure MC server keyword triggers and replies, supporting text and commands.

bind.qq_exists_suffix: " already has bindings. Continue? (May overwrite data)
bind.qq_invalid: Please enter a valid QQ number.
bind.confirm_delete_qq_when_empty_suffix: " has no game IDs. Delete this QQ binding record?
bind.delete_all: Delete all bindings for this QQ
bind.title: QQ-Game ID Binding Settings
bind.desc: Manage QQ number and game ID binding relationships. Note: Editing here only modifies `GUGUbot.json` file.

ban_word.title: Banned Words Settings
ban_word.desc: Configure banned words in QQ groups. Messages containing these words will be automatically withdrawn.
ban_word.word_tip: Banned word (delete and re-add to modify)

shenhe.qq_invalid: Please enter a valid QQ number.
shenhe.confirm_delete_qq_when_empty_suffix: " has no aliases. Delete this reviewer QQ record?
shenhe.confirm_delete_all_prefix: Delete all info for reviewer QQ "
shenhe.title: Reviewer QQ Settings
shenhe.desc: Configure QQ numbers with review permissions.

uuid_qqid.title: UUID-QQID Mapping Settings
uuid_qqid.desc: Manage game UUID and QQ number mapping relationships. UUIDs are usually auto-generated by system, not recommended to modify manually.

help_msg.title: Help Message Settings
help_msg.desc: Configure help message text in QQ groups. Note: Only text content can be modified, config items cannot be added or deleted. \n in config files represents line breaks, rendered as real line breaks in this editor.
help_msg.user_desc: Help information displayed to regular users
help_msg.format_tip: Use \n for line breaks, do not delete necessary formatting when editing.

gugubot.common_editor_tip: This file uses a common editor. Refer to plugin docs for meanings.
gugubot.empty_object: This config file is an empty object.
